review: 10/10 The only non- Mature game where two naked men can have a bloody fist fight in the middle of a forest.It's very fun. It's free. It's like DayZ, mixed with LFD2, mixed with Minecraft.I look forward to the future of this game a lot.

Chivalry- there are few other games like it. While it's graphics aren't the greatest, no one cares. With the amount of fun and action this brings you, you'll be consumed and keep coming back for more. With many game modes, maps, weapons and classes, this game is better than most FPS or fighting games I've played. Well done, Torn Banner, well done indeed.
